content: wool acrylic 100% orange greenfinch and brown 3mm hook tapestry needle stuffing a pumpkin is tall about 3 cm and wide about 5 5 cm stitches used magic_ring chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch 2sctog = work 2 single_crochet together as you can use my patterns to make and sell your creations all i ask is that design credit and a link are posted in the description of the item if you have any questions feel free to contact me i d love to see your work share photos of your creations to page me on fb valery lab thanks again for visiting this page and happy crocheting bye bye
